traits.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
traits.desc: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: * At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible) * 3/day each: jump, levitate (self only), misty step, nondetection (self only) * 1/day each: Bigby's hand, mass suggestion, plane shift, telekinesis
